TextView.android:text: * For events 11 & 12, the decision whether to conduct Heats or Final depends on the number of teams participating. If Heats takes place, there is a slot for the final later on 3rd October.
* For events 4 & 5, the decision whether to conduct Heats or Final depends on the number of teams participating. If Heats takes place, there is a slot for the final later on 3rd October.
